message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $110?
I appreciate the willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $110. How about $105?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I'm willing to give you a bit more. How about we meet at $108?
I'm almost there, but I'd love to get it for $105. Can you meet me at that price?
